SEARCH
Package io.github.lycoriscafe.nexus.http.helper.configuration

Class HttpServerConfiguration

java.lang.Object
io.github.lycoriscafe.nexus.http.helper.configuration.HttpServerConfiguration
Direct Known Subclasses:
HttpsServerConfiguration
public sealed class HttpServerConfiguration extends Object permits HttpsServerConfiguration
Configurations for HttpServer.
Since:
v1.0.0
See Also:
  • HttpServer

  • Constructor Details

    • HttpServerConfiguration

      public HttpServerConfiguration(String basePackage, String tempDirectory)
      Create an instance of HttpServerConfiguration.
      Parameters:
      basePackage - Package that need to scan for HttpEndpoint classes. Sub packages will be also included.
      tempDirectory - Temporary directory location for in-API server tasks. It must be seperated directories if you implement more than one server.
      Since:
      v1.0.0
      See Also:
      • HttpServerConfiguration
      API Note:
       
 // Example endpoint scan scenario
 var serverConfig = new HttpServerConfiguration("org.example.server_x", "TempServer_x");
 _
 |- org.example
      |- server_x
          |- Class_1.java [included]
          |- Class_2.java [included]
          |- sub_package_1
              |- Class_3.java [included]
      |- server_y
          |- Class_4.java [not included]
          |- Class_5.java [not included]
          |- sub_package_2
              |- Class_6.java [not included]

    • setPort

      public HttpServerConfiguration setPort(int port)
      Set server port number.If you didn't specify it here, after initialize the server, default value will be updated to the actual port number.
      Parameters:
      port - Server port number. Default is 0 (it means an implementation specific default will be used).
      Returns:
      Same HttpServerConfiguration instance
      Since:
      v1.0.0
      See Also:
      • ServerSocket(int, int)
      • ServerSocket(int, int, InetAddress)
      • HttpServerConfiguration

    • getPort

      public int getPort()
      Get server port number. If you didn't specify the port number, a random system dependent port number will be chosen. It will print when server initialization.
      Returns:
      Server port number
      Since:
      v1.0.0
      See Also:
      • setPort(int)
      • HttpServerConfiguration

      public HttpServerConfiguration setBacklog(int backlog)

      Returns:
      Same HttpServerConfiguration instance
      Since:

    • setUrlPrefix

      public HttpServerConfiguration setUrlPrefix(String urlPrefix)
      Set prefix to the endpoint. Default is empty. 
           
     // This code will give -> http://host:port/api/v1.0.0/sampleEndpointClass/sampleEndpoint

     var serverConfig = new HttpServerConfiguration("org.example")
          .setUrlPrefix("/api/v1.0.0");

     // ...

     @HttpEndpoint("/sampleEndpointClass")
     public class SampleEndpointClass {
          @GET("/sampleEndpoint")
          public static HttpResponse sampleEndpoint(HttpRequest request,
                                                    HttpResponse response) {
              // ...
              return response;
          }
     }
      Parameters:
      urlPrefix - URL prefix
      Returns:
      Same HttpServerConfiguration instance
      Since:
      v1.0.0
      See Also:
      • HttpServerConfiguration

    • getUrlPrefix

      public String getUrlPrefix()
      Get URL prefix.
      Returns:
      URL prefix
      Since:
      v1.0.0
      See Also:
      • setUrlPrefix(String)
      • HttpServerConfiguration

    • setStaticFilesDirectory

      public HttpServerConfiguration setStaticFilesDirectory(String staticFilesDirectory)
      Set static files' directory. This directory will serve static contents like .html. Default is null. 
           
     var serverConfig = new HttpServerConfiguration("org.example")
          .setStaticFilesDirectory("NexusStaticFiles");

      NexusStaticFiles
      |- TestFile.html [http://host:port/TestFile.html]
      |- styles
          |- Styles.css [http://host:port/styles/Styles.css]
      Parameters:
      staticFilesDirectory - Static files directory
      Returns:
      Same HttpServerConfiguration instance
      Since:
      v1.0.0
      See Also:
      • HttpServerConfiguration
      API Note:
      This version has the implementation, but it's not completed and will not work.

    • setMaxHeaderSize

      public HttpServerConfiguration setMaxHeaderSize(int maxHeaderSize)
      Set maximum header size in bytes. Default is 10,240.
      Parameters:
      maxHeaderSize - Maximum header size in bytes
      Returns:
      Same HttpServerConfiguration instance
      Since:
      v1.0.0
      See Also:
      • HttpServerConfiguration
      API Note:
      1 byte = 1 character. The actual size calculated by maxHeaderSize - 2.

    • setMaxIncomingConnections

      public HttpServerConfiguration setMaxIncomingConnections(int maxIncomingConnections)
      Set maximum incoming connections for server. If this count is overwhelm, next connections will go to backlog until remaining connection dies. Default is 100.
      Parameters:
      maxIncomingConnections - Maximum incoming connections for server
      Returns:
      Same HttpServerConfiguration instance
      Since:
      v1.0.0
      See Also:
      • setBacklog(int)
      • HttpServerConfiguration

    • setMaxContentLength

      public HttpServerConfiguration setMaxContentLength(int maxContentLength)
      Set maximum content length that can process with an incoming request in bytes. Default is 5,242,880.
      Parameters:
      maxContentLength - Maximum content length
      Returns:
      Same HttpServerConfiguration instance
      Since:
      v1.0.0
      See Also:
      • setMaxChunkedContentLength(int)
      • HttpServerConfiguration
      API Note:
      This will not apply to the requests that comes with Transfer-Encoding: chunked header.

    • setMaxChunkedContentLength

      public HttpServerConfiguration setMaxChunkedContentLength(int maxChunkedContentLength)
      Set maximum chunked content length in bytes. Default is 104,857,600.
      Parameters:
      maxChunkedContentLength - Maximum chunked content length
      Returns:
      Same HttpServerConfiguration instance
      Since:
      v1.0.0
      See Also:
      • setMaxChunkSize(int)
      • setMaxContentLength(int)
      • HttpServerConfiguration
      API Note:
      This will only apply to the requests that have Transfer-Encoding: chunked header.

    • setMaxChunkSize

      public HttpServerConfiguration setMaxChunkSize(int maxChunkSize)
      Set maximum chunk size in bytes. Default is 5,242,880.
      Parameters:
      maxChunkSize - Maximum chunk size
      Returns:
      Same HttpServerConfiguration instance
      Since:
      v1.0.0
      See Also:
      • setMaxChunkSize(int)
      • setMaxChunkedContentLength(int)
      • HttpServerConfiguration
      API Note:
      Maximum chunk size means the maximum size of a single chunk that can have in chunked content.
